jobActivity.title: LinkedIn Message
jobActivity.body:
Request to connect Amir Noormahamod Amir Noormahamod · 2nd Recruitment Consultant at Nigel Frank International JUL 4 Muhammet Atalay sent the following messages at 11:21 PM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 11:21 PM Hello Amir, How are you? I am interested in Dynamics CRM Architect contract based opportunity as seen in the following link: https://job-openings.monster.co.uk/architect-ms-dynamics-crm-warwickshire-flexible-rate-warwickshire-mid-uk-nigel-frank-international/209753701?aid=156652958&uid=100010E923A349D3E19E056CEF11B39DCEE1E62B7E1706187DF238A301B997D4E2C97D452A516B5E7812A409A7EE803E72E390CB1373447CA312711B186AA25E6A4EE655B7A452D4DC083CEAB6903996F0AF26&ExpLevel=PowerSearchRequisitionMatch&Exp=JP9&Score=0.651128047463265&rank=6&imp=6&jvs=e,ar,t,6&md_src=email&md_med=email_alerts&md_cpn=prod&md_key=0&md_cnt=applynowbtn_body
Architect - MS Dynamics CRM - Warwickshire - Flexible Rate - Nigel Frank International job-openings.monster.co.uk Complete the job application for Architect - MS Dynamics CRM - Warwickshire - Flexible Rate in Warwi… shall we arrange a session or call tomorrow if you are available?
thanks & Regards,
Muhammet ATALAY
JUL 5 Amir Noormahamod sent the following message at 10:49 AM View Amir’s profile Amir Noormahamod Amir Noormahamod 10:49 AM Morning Muhammet,
Thanks for getting back.
When are you free for a chat?
Kind regards, Amir.
Muhammet Atalay sent the following messages at 11:22 AM View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 11:22 AM What about after 1 hour?
Regards
Muhammet
View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 12:29 PM Please have a look at my CV .
Download MuhammetAtalay_CV.docx MuhammetAtalay_CV.docx 1 MB
Download
TODAY View Muhammet’s profile Muhammet Atalay Muhammet Atalay 12:56 AM Hello Amir, How are you? I have seen couple Dynamics CRM related position in Nigel Frank. shall we arrange a phone call tomorrow 10:00 am if you are available?
regards, Muhammet ATALAY.
